name: Spotlight (Dieting Hippo)
description:
From the README...

Created by: Dieting Hippo
Twitter: @DietingHippo
Created for Input Optional Jam 2019
---------

Instructions:
Let the randomly generated tune play while you listen along.

If you wish to create a new tune, press "Space" to queue up a new tune. The musicians will get to it in time.
